values:
<center>You touched my heart you touched my soul.
You changed my life and all my goals.
And love is blind and that I knew when,
My heart was blinded by you.
I've kissed your lips and held your head.
Shared your dreams and shared your bed.
I know you well, I know your smell.
I've been addicted to you..</center>

My New Year Resolutions.

1. I shall think more about ducks.

2. I shall whistle more and do more of my bird calls.

3. I shall have more afternoon naps.

4. Umm... that's all i can think of at the moment.

5. Oh yes... I've just remembered, I will finish composing my mandolin concerto called "The Duck Concerto."

6. ...and maybe something about butterflies.

So the silly girl spent most of her time being blurry but when she was still i got some pictures. She looked so pretty. The only thing that annoyed me was the well, the two things were the drunk couple next to me who would stop making out and the girl was Piiiiised! and get was all wobbly and shit so i figured i'd stand REALLY close to her and breath heavy and sway and stuff and she told her boyfriend [EVENTUALLY] that she was ill and they left ^_^. So THEN imogen came out after some SEXY celloist and a Crazy drummer friend. So... First she came out and said hello and then introduced Canary Cello or whatever her name was...windsong... and said she'd be back later cause she had to have a spot of dinner. Then she was hot. Oh yer i forgot...the only other thing that annoyed me was the whisper from the crowd that was just..whsisis-'The Oc'-psspwswsw-Oc-wsws-yer say goodn....pawswss. Fuck at you. Anyhow, it turned out a fucking fantastic night. Joe and i buzzed around london before we got out train back to Cambridge Uni which is where im staying with him for a couple days...Then im back to Blondon and then Europe baby. Love that shit... Miss you all. [ALL] Love. xo. [Still wasn't the same without you Cody.]

Imogen Heap tonight you ugly cunts.

Me and Joe gon hit it up!

Boo-Ya.

Love xo

Well fuck me in the ass.

I just bought my ticket to imgoen heap show in february in London...for a grand total of ten pound.
happiest christmas day ever...
...also because i found out i can just steal the people next door's wireless internet so...hahahahaha..

and merry christmas to all you fuckers aswell...

OMG Cody will love this... The guy on my flight next to me from singapore to London was Count Olaf.. and He TOTALLY was.. this is the sexy grave yard too.. Well...thats all LOVE [how i managed to get a photo of that guy i dont know :-/]

Jeeze. I leave for four days and the place turns into indonesia! I can't say me being here makes me miss Brisbane... But it does make me miss a whole bunch of you people. It's too cold here for it to snow and it's that wierd...am-i-going-to-rain-or-just-be-a-shit-and-make-you-take-your-umbrella-and-not-need-it-anyway-make-you-hyphenate type of weather. Places here are nice though, it's not like a regular city.. There is an awesome grave yard at the end of my street and everything is so cute. i love the shambles.. This is a short bridge away from me too... I could get used to this...although i do miss everyone... I think we're going to the Moors tomorrow.. gives me a change from all these white people. [I think cody will get this....] miss you all, love you all.. i love watching the news and hearing.. sunrise tomorrow will be at 8:45 AM and sunset at 3:14 PM.. Jeeze...ur at home at like 4:30 and like..hm..bout bed time...? right-o... x o

In Singapore sillies.

Free Internet ^_^

Still ave four hours to wait for my flight....haven't slept, the fucking bitch on the plane next to me slept the whole way. Whore.


Im going to goo and get coffee...

red eyes, red eyes, red eyes......what a treat!

Love.


Oh the puns are delicious here... Singabore!, Singa[havetowait]Four hours, Sin...ok...whatever..fuck you.
tired!


Grr..im finished and i have 11 mintues and 40 seconds of free time left...
ill go and let someone else use me...as a toy.

Whatever..


bitches.

C h a p t e r
One
The page you are reading with your two eyes-assuming you are in fact reading this page, and that you only have two eyes-is one of two texts in the world which will show you the difference between the word "nervous" and the word "anxious." The other text of course is the Dictionary, and if i were you i would read that instead. Like this text, the dictionary shows you that the word "nervous" means 'Worried about something'-you might feel nervous, for instance if you were served prune icecream for dessert, because you would be worried that it would taste awful-whereas the word "anxious" means 'troubled by disturbing suspense,' which is what you might feel if you were served a live alligator for dessert, because you would be troubled by the disturbing suspense about whether you would eat your dessert or it would eat you, and that is exactly what i am feeling, Anxious. My flight leaves in not that many hours, and i am going crazy. But crazy times bring crazy fun. I hope you all have a wonderful christmas and i hope you enjoy some sort of pudding. Take Care, I love you. Gareth- xoxxo.

I'm Terrorfied. I leave in 10 days. I have to manage getting to Singapore, connecting to London, leaving London to King's Cross and getting another train to York, by myself. I will have no-one with me and i have no idea where to go or what to do. I will die, because the people i care most about ever will not be with me and i wont see them for months. I'm excited, but, im scared, which i know is normal, but.... i don't know... Irregardless... Totally if you want a postcard leave me your address so you can be sent some fancy shit. I'll be posting lots of stories and photos and things whenst im over there hopefully. But ill certainly be in touch with everyone. Argh.. Love. xoxo Take Care.

Misster!! Misster!! x I miss having money i could actually spend. [Although i DID buy a Hot Ted Baker wallet today, which i could not afford at all but also, could not turn down. x I miss getting drunk at john's house with James and Cody. x I miss school. x I miss not having any responsibility at work and just enjoying it without having to worry about oders or banking or closing or looking after juniors. x I miss having enough time to spend with people i care about rather than having no time for anything. I hate telling people i haven't seen that 'we'll definately catch up' but then not having enough time for any of that. I suprisingly don't miss my sister. Ma keeps asking if i miss her and i keep saying no, which is true. I don't know why.
I Love Behrooz Araz. hahaa... "Oh Behrooz..i've been ever so shot in the arm" HaHa
Fuck! I have to stop caring so much about myself. I hate being selfish.

x I've drunk everynight for the past week and a half. x My arse fuck brother is in prison again. In which case ive stopped caring. x My non-existant father is in hospital again for cancer or something. x I'm home alone. x I need a hug so fucking badly. x Worst of all? [this one's good :p] I drove past Holland Park TWICE! and yelled 'Hi cow.' didn't get SHIT back. Maybe you were out? :P x XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX However, i DID go to ikea today to...spruce up some shit... it slightly worked. About that hug...
You know its early in the morning when i have to get up for work and the sandman hasn't even been yet!

WHY WOULD MELINDA PUT ME AS A FUCKING REFERENCE FOR HER NEW JOB!?!?! i hate you slut!!! fuck me.
I'm Calm
Today this girl quit work, and it was the happiest day of my life.

Today I...

Drank 3.5 litres of water.
Collapsed in the bush because i went for a fucking run.
Cut my hands trimming my lemon grass.
Listened to one song 8 times and cried.
Need[ed] a hug.

It's easier to believe in this sweet madness.

At uni, i decided to get my assignment done.
With exactly 50 minutes to spare thank you very much.
I'm going to die. I didn't even understand it and just made it up.
Whatever, better than doing nothing.

i REEK of Jim Beam.
:)

Hello, We're back, and we're taking calls.
Now what was the question?

So, I Belive i will start with a passage from one of my favourite books, Which seems pretty suited to the events of my day. "If you were to take a plastic bag and place it inside a large bowl, and then, using a wooden spoon, stir the bag around and around the bowl, you could use the expression 'a mixed bag' to describe what you had infront of you, But you would not be using it in the same way i am about to use it now. Although "a mixed bag" sometimes refers to a plastic bag that has been stirred in a bowl, more often it is used to describe a situation that has both good parts and bad parts. An Afternoon at a movie theatre for instance, would be a mixed bag if your favourite movie were showing, but if you had to eat gravel instead of popcorn. A trip to the zoo would be a very mixed bag if the weather were beautiful but if all the man and woman-eating lions were running around loose." My day was a mixed bag because, However enjoyable it was, the bad parts were very very bad. My day began with [Actually on reflection my day really wasn't that enjoyable at all] I just seem to make light of a bad situation when a clearly worse one proceeded it. Cody picked me up [Actually really looking back on it my day was really bad.] from my house and we were watching some stupid show about carrots and we ended up leaving knowing we'd be in a rush for the bus to Kelvin Grove. So, we got to casteldine JUST as james messaged us saying the free loop bus had left. So, we ended up saying we would meet him at Kelvin Grove because we were going for breakfast. When we got to Kelvin Grove we drove and drove and Kelvin Drove and there was not a single car park anywhere. So we messaged james ONCE again, [After having to buy petrol because the indicator kept hitting against the empty 'E'.] So we told James we would meet him at Gardens point, and the ONLY place we could get a park that we felt safe in [After a previous towing incident involving both Cody, Myself, Sam and a burleigh Tow-Truck driver who didn't seem to think trading sex from three young supple boys for our car back free of charge was funny.] So the ONLY safe parking place we got ended up costing us like 14 dollars or seomthing for the hour that we were there, i ordered the wrong coffee, i didn't Get to order my Vegetable Panini and James was running late for his lecture so he had to leave. So Cody and I hopped back in the car and decided to drive to the Valley to take nice pictures and what not and eat or something. [Most of our time is spent accomplishing random ideas that pop into our heads.] So we parked in New Farm, and walked to the Valley and took some nice pictures and whatever, and decided to get maccas. [ Number one, big mistake, number two...is it just me or is everyone in the valley mall maccas wierd but you just dont seem to care cause the only time you USUALLY go in there is on a night out when ur too drunk to care. ] Yer, Big Mistake. Felt Sick. Then, Cody [who stupidly ordered Two Quater Pounders?] [Anyone who decides it's time to eat half a pound of processed meat should be slapped with it] was holding the Camera and we were walking along and he didn't eat his second burger so he gave it to me and said..'Urgh, i don't want it, You give it to someone.' So the first nice mad i offered it too didn't seem to ant a burger, free of charge. and the second man i offered it too clearly wanted more than a small squirt of special sauce.. [disregarding the lack of special sauce on a quaterpounder burger.] So, i held out the burger as he was walking past and he looked at me and took it and said [Keeping in mind, he was NOT a bum, he was about 56, semi well dressed [although vile] and he said to me. 'Is this for me?' I said, yes. to which he [Quite rudely] Replied, "Is this all i get?!" Cody [Whislt filming this on camera, so don't worry we have proof] :P said, " oh there's two packets of Ketchup in there, so..you can have them and he said once again.. "Is this all i get?" I Said..oh Napkins, and pulled out two from my pocket. [I always seem to take far too many napkins form places and end up keeping them in my pocket but they always seem to come in handy] Anyhow, i handed him the napkins and he looked at them and flipped them over and said.. 'Isn't the your number on these Napkins? and i looked at them and said... "Um..No Sorry." He replied, "It should be." cody politely said Bye and we ran in the opposite direction, the entire length of the valley Mall and i had to wait, sitting, agaisnt a pole outisde Belushi's rocking back and forth for cody to catch up, and we were both terrorfied. We couldn't stop laugihng though, he was the yukkiest man, and the fact that he took the burger and Still wasn't satisfied, hurt and insulted me. So, Cody and i waslked back into New Farm and drove off, and we were just out of the valley and coming over the hill towards the Hospital and We stalled. The car behind us [A Bright Blue Holden Ute] beeped and honked and Cody and i just waved out the window...and then i belive, he stalled his car. So, He was Drivey B. Grouch behind us, and when we pulled up next to him a bit further down the road we both smiled and waved at him. [Now, i think this is the difinative part of my story in wihch it takes a turen for the worse] The Driver of the ute, who i assume was a builder because he seemed to have the IQ of a towel didn't seem to enjoy Cody and Myself's Hospitalable wave and smile. It just seemed to anger him. So, he decided to follow us in a rageful manner. He was tail-gating us and we drove all the way to Kedron and he wouldnt stop following us, so we turned down stafford road and he [To use a quote from every film] 'was hot on our tail.' So, We saw all this traffic ahead and there was a red light and Cody and I were like..What do we do?! So cody slowed down, and the Ute man, tried to pull up beside us, but some lady pulled in front of him and stopped him [Thank Fucking Christ] So, The lady drove off and i said to Cody, just Quickly turn down that street and we'll loose him. So, Cody indicated and this made the man Very angry, So, he swerved out over several lanes and blocked our car so we couldnt go striaght ahead, and he was blocking ALL this traffic on Busy Stafofrd Road, so Cody and i quickly turned and he followed and cody had nowhere to go, there was a no through road and a one little lane thing, so we turned down there and the man followed and by now Cody and i are terrorfied, So... We came to another red light but pulled into a gas station and were winding down the windows screaming at anyone we could. The man kept following us, so we pulled another evaisive manouver outta there and got back onto Stafford Road heading back in the opposite way we just came. He kept following so i pulled out my Phone and tried calling other James twice, but apparently A phone with 'Withheld Number' isnt important enough! anyway, i finally found in my phone the number for mobile phone Police and it was ringing and i looked back and showed the angry, Angry man i was on my mobile and im like nodding and he mouthed, something along the lines of... 'Fucking call them!' [Take a narrative novel approach to this passage] Two rings... The Phone Connected.. The man on the other line had an accent and i couldnt understand what he said to me, my hands we sweaty and shaking and i could see the angry ute drive in the rear view mirror. I told the man on the other end that there was a man that wouldn't stop following us, and he was terribly agressive looking. The calm man on the end of the line repeated what he said previous... i heard it this time. 'Police, Ambulance or Fire'? Police i said.. Having never called the police before the adrenaline from that, plus the chase had my heart beating too fast. 'The line connected again'.. 'Police, what is your emergency?' This man's voice was even calmer than the first. He was also Australian. I was shaking like crazy, 'There's a man in a bright blue ute, who is road rage chasing us.' I didn't know what to say.. 'What is your Location?' The man asked? 'Kedron i said, the corner of Gympie road and Stafford Road.' 'Is the Persuit still in Progress' the policeman said. I looked over my shoulder. Too scared to stick my head out the window i tured and saw the man pull off into a side street and vanishing with a beep of his horn and a hand signal that didn't look nice. I put the phone back to my ear, it was sweaty and cold. 'He's gone now i said, but we were just terrorfied.' 'Can i get your name?' 'Gareth' i told him... 'G-a-r-e-t-h.' He asked me my last name and i spelt him that aswell. '..and you live in McDowall he asked?' I told him that was correct. He asked me if i would like to make a formal complaint. I said 'No.' and i thanked him and hung up. Cody and i took the back streets home. We didn't stop fucking shaking for about an hour and a half afterwards. Cody said a funny thing, You watch those Oprah specials where they test to see if you can remember details about criminals and things like that. In a moment of fear and panic, you don't seem to remember in great detail things about the man that is trying to car you down. Luckily, im a quick thinker and managed a picture of the gentleman. He looked like a fish crossed with a pudding. Cody and i got home and decided it was enough excitement for one day. We watched a film and cody decided to leave to go to his house...Which soon enough won't need be the case. Every Ute we saw on the way home terrorfied us. I laughed alot today, which is good i guess. I bought a sexy jacket for five dollars. [Which doesn't imply much of a sexy..but..you'd be surprised] I guess my day was a mixed bag after all. [Love] Siiigh. Never a dull day. :) Take care. Gareth-
That helmet would never protect your brain from lasers!

Dig if you will the picture
Of you and I engaged in a kiss
The sweat of your body covers me
Can you my darling
Can you picture this?

Dream if you can a courtyard
An ocean of violets in bloom
Animals strike curious poses.
They feel the heat,
The heat between me and you.

Touch if you will my stomach.
Feel how it trembles inside.
You've got the butterflies all tied up.
Don't make me chase you,
Even doves have pride.

How can you just leave me standing?
Alone in a world so cold.
Maybe I'm just too demanding
Maybe I'm just like my father, too bold.
Maybe I'm just like my mother?
She's never satisfied, with eachother.
This is what it sounds like 
When doves cry.

Wow..So what a fantastic fun 100% couple of things it's been.
Had my sister's Grad-ya-ation yesterday.
She goes away on Sat, so ill terribly missing her.

Um..Work was good fun today.
A girl came in and said she had to work till nine o'clock and that she didn't have any dinner so i told her i would make her dinner, so i went and bought a plate and some noodles and snow peas and mushrooms and things of this nature and made her up some yummy stir fry and put it in the fridge at work so when she comes in (cause i finished EARLY) my work will heat it up for her and she'll have Yummy warm dinner.

she was a bit unsure, but i told her to come in and just say. 'Gareth had dinner for me here?' and they'd know what she was talking about ;)

Bowling was hotdogs fun.

I believe im moving out.

Sam is coming back to Brookside to work because he quit his traineeship.  ^_^

Cody is finally out of debt to me. Hoorah.
and...that's all.
Hope you're all well. 
Love Love.
Take Care,
Gareth-

I miss you, but i haven't met you yet.
So Special, but it hasn't happened yet.
You're Gorgeous, but i havent' met you yet.
I remember, but it hasn't happened yet.

I need some sleep
It can't go on like this
I tried counting sheep
But there's one I always miss
Everyone says I'm getting down too low
Everyone says you just gotta let it go
You just gotta let it go
You just gotta let it go

I need some sleep
Time to put the old horse down
I'm in too deep
And the wheels keep spinning 'round
Everyone says I'm getting' down too low
Everyone says you just gotta let it go
You just gotta let it go
You just gotta let it go.



[sigh]

I found out today my friend's father died. This guy was adopted too so i imagine it would have been extra difficult. He said he was trying to find work now that his dad was dead so he could look after his mother. I almost cried. Work was a salty spanking on the bottom aswell. I refuse to get grumpy. I just laugh at it with Libby. My chest is hurting again so its time i got a new one. Urgh, i need a new heart too :( That's where all My pay will be going. ha. Well, that's all. turns out ill be able to save enough i think for England. (Still wants to go to America too.) hot.

Hahahaha.
Funniest day of work ever.
I actually had  a really great day.
Mindy went home early then it got busy..gr..
But..two seperate girls gave me their numbers :S
and then..haha..guy went and got gloria jeans and i told him just to get me whatever..and the wanker got me a chai and old Gloria jeans guy said... 'Is the Chai for Gareth is it?'
EW.
fuck you old man river.
Steve and Autumn [Owners] came in and started talking up their resturant down the coast and how everyone is saying its the best food on the goldcoast. i sad..' aw..the food wasn't that good' :P
Stir up some shit.

Love you lovlies.

Finally off anti-biotics. Thank ya.
Family Friend commited suicide, not so great.
But..other than that?
Super ^_^.
I..Love you all.

I've had some time off work, i feel good.

Actually, this is sort of the best i've felt in a longish time.
All i need to do is see some (Jamesish & Diya) people i've missed lots, and EVERYTHING will be yummy.


Do i look happy?
:)

EDIT:: I forgot to tell you i had the scariest craziest dream ever children, i dreamt i was walking along the street at night and these two REALLY creepy people dressed as crows attacked me so i climbed up this big podium thing in the middle of no where that was actually a cliff, and then i climbed up there it and it was pretty fucking tall and then i don't know where form, but james started climbing this podium thing too (im assuming to get away from the crow people) and, he was near the top and i put my arm out to grab him to pull him up, and i was pulling him up, but...i slipped off the edge and fell. it was scary. not alot of dreams i wake up from, but i  woke up from that. 

Um...thats all ^_^
turns out im back on anti-biotics so...hahaha.
fun fun fun.
Well, the dream was scary and interesting when i had it...not so much when i retold it.
Boo, you whores.

So...Hm...

Nick rang me (we all remember big nick from work) and he was terrorfied because Carl our Manager who is a skieze wantefd to have a meeting with him and nick didnt know what it was about so he rang me and i was all i have no idea why Carl wants to have a meeting with you (Knowing fine well Carl was going to fire him)
But nick had an exam the next day and he was stressing out and he said that if Carl wanted to say something he'd rather he just said it over the phone now so he wasn't worried for his exam.
So i rang carl and told him what nick said and Carl said oh Gareth..you just fire him.

So...i had to ring Nick back, who is a good friend of mine and Fire him from our store cause Carl is an Axe-wound.
It wasn't a fun thing to do, but lucky im professional. ^_^

More doctors appointments, more Anti-Biotics, throw in an optomitrist appointment and Melinda getting Back from Holidays, firing Nick, Forgetting to put people on the payroll so they don't get paid and then get shitty with me..Is pretty much my shitty fucking ass week.

So, hopefully when i get back i'll be happy and things.
I hit my head on the over door today and it fucking hurt like mad. 
Melinda still thinks sh'e stop shit and the rude bitch was actually jealous and envious of me because SHE wanted to fire nick. Urgh, what a whore.
I'd like to fire her the day before an exam.
slut face.
Anyways, week was shit. 
Work is Shit.
Life...= downer.
wa-ever.
Take care :)

Why, do, when ever i see james, i get depressed?
Whats with that?!
I don't get it.
Wa-ever.

I don't really know where to begin, so i guess i will use Robert Frost's adive when he said, 'You're searching, Joe, for things that don't exist; I mean beginnings. Ends and beginnings -- there are no such things. There are only middles.'

Which means, i guess i will begin in the middle of my story (Which begun 18 years ago, when i woke up bloody and moist.)
Nothing much happened in between but this morning i wopke up at 6:30 and caught a bus to a trian station and hopped on a train and then got off and waited for another train (In which time cody and I spoke to two ladies and wanted a photo with them but the only way to make them be in it was if we pretended we were from London and said it was our last day in Brisbane) old fools. ha


So we waited and caught the train down to Nerang and got off and caught a bus which let us off at Pacific Fair. We wanted to go beach and silly us didn't look, so we didn't get a bus so we walked the 4 Km to Caville. In hindsight it wasn't that bad, and it made us want to swim more. So we were carrying heavy bags  and we went into the toilet to get changed and they were empty and i walked up to the filthy door and didn't want to touch it so i kicked it open slowly and there was a man standing in there, and i absolutely SHAT myself and Cody and I ran away.
Then, we went and got changed in Macca's toilets.
Then we went swimming and we took pictures of hotties 
(when ever Cody and i are together we always BLATENTLY take pictures of attractive people :S) 
Then we swam and by this time it was 1:10 and lunch reservations were at 2:30 so we had to hurry so we got changed into hot clothes and caught the bus down to the resturant, my meal was possibly the BEST food i have ever tasted, i had veal and things and truffles and it was totally worth the $110.oo. 

Then we walked over the casino for a drink and a gambley gambley.
Which i lost my money and drank my drink and we decided to go home so we made friends with a hottie named Mark at the train station but he got off in i dunnoo..somewhere Gross.. and we were alone THEN i was supposed to go to movies with Tony and that for Hannah's birthday, but i just came home cause i was completely tired.

And ALL our photos we took ALL day got wiped somehow on the train home, and i MAY be woorking in the resturant i had lunch at at Surfers AND Micheal messaged me again asking if i was still living at home and how i was. Ew.

AND i got the strangest message.
but im far to tired to type about it..basically a gir
sigh ill type it so it makes sense
I went to a production ages ago with my Friend Yvette and aftrer it i didnt talk to her for ages and apparently she got snooty so i was drunk yesterday (wait, was NOT drunk) and sent her a message saying i was sorry and i was a prick and friends?
she rpelied with..r u gay?
I said..yer..what made u aske that tho?
She said. ' i thought you were hot like HOT hot whyd u have to be gay? some girls at uni said u  were so i thought id ask, home embarassing i feel like a loser. Friends?
Yeah, wa-ever.

So..that's basically it. i'm quite boring. and you're quite bored.
In the words of Micheal a. Phillipson...

'fuck off.'

So...
Lots has happened.

The thing with Melinda is...i don't know. Apparently  she is becoming assistant manager or so i hear, so i asked her if she did all that shit just to make me look bad so she could get the job...i told told her i didn't care about the position and wa-ever. She didn't REALLY answer me. wa-ever.

Carl said my close was good so fuck you. 

I went to an 18th last night which was in Bracken-ridge.
At least Sam was there, but you know...
Beer bongs strewn across lawns. We weren't even at the party and we'd heard the word 'cunt' so much.
We were loners..but..get a few drinks into me and..haha.
It was the kind of protective parent party where you had to have your name ticked off at the door :S. wa-ever.

Everyone there was hot. Except straight and terrorfying. But i started talking to people. 
Ya! omg...there was a guy there who did prac at my school (he's like 23 or something and kinda hot)
so i was talking to him about shitty padua and he's like what kinda of school did you WANT to go to?
i said anything but there...somewhere which had drama perhaps. and he said Nudgee has good drama. and Lizzy who was pissed said, 'Nudgee is for fags.'
he goes 'I did drama at Nudgee [hot].'
Then lizzy's like..oh im sorry..he's all..  'yeah, don't touch me.'
Ha...it was hot!

So some girl i forget her name wants me to go to the valley next froday cause (ha) some girl called Lina! it's her last day in Australia or someshit...so..wa-ever.
She was fat.

I got out of opening at work in the morning and oh..hehe..remided me..some girl came into work (who comes in sometimes) she's like grade 12 or wa-ever and a geek. hot geek. :S
and she comes up to the counter and is like how's your sex life??'
'um..Bollocks.'

so..yer... tlaked to poeple, Yukky cheap Daquiri machine...3/4 my bottle of vodka..:S
it was an ok night..
No homeless girls to kiss there, so it was clean.
ha.

sue drove us home and totally saved us cab fare.
Fuck i hate sue.
:P

Wa-ever.
it was hot.
Take care-

So... I accidentally, inadvertantly swallowed all my toothpaste the other morning while i was brushing my teeth. I was just brushing normally and went *hurk* and swallowed it all and then felt sick for the rest of the day. It was yukkers. So i got to work (on SAD-ter-day) and the other supervisor had gone somewhere and i was sitting out the back and guy said, 'Oh, mindy was going to have a word with you about your shit close.'
